title: 'Tahrir Harassment' Trials End In Sexual Assault Convictions
teaser: Sexual assault convictions have been handed down to some Egyptian men, after several women were attacked during celebrations for incoming President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi.
contentencoded:
Sexual assault convictions have been handed down to some Egyptian men, after several women were attacked during celebrations for incoming President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi. Audie Cornish speaks with freelance journalist Nadine Marroushi about the verdicts.

Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
